mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (user_id, post_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.create_time, p.comment_count, p.like_count FROM post p JOIN favorite f ON p.id = f.post_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC
